verses.verse: The word <WH1697> of the LORD <WH3068> which <WH834> came <WH1961> to <WH413> Jeremiah <WH3414> the prophet <WH5030> against <WH5921> the Gentiles; <WH1471>

Against Egypt, <WH4714> against <WH5921> the army <WH2428> of Pharaoh Necho <WH6549> king <WH4428> of Egypt, <WH4714> which <WH834> was <WH1961> by <WH5921> the river <WH5104> Euphrates <WH6578> in Carchemish, <WH3751> which <WH834> Nebuchadnezzar <WH5019> king <WH4428> of Babylon <WH894> smote <WH5221> in the fourth <WH7243> year <WH8141> of Jehoiakim <WH3079> the son <WH1121> of Josiah <WH2977> king <WH4428> of Judah. <WH3063>
Order <WH6186> ye the buckler <WH4043> and shield, <WH6793> and draw near <WH5066> to battle. <WH4421>

Harness <WH631> the horses; <WH5483> and get up, <WH5927> ye horsemen, <WH6571> and stand forth <WH3320> with your helmets; <WH3553> furbish <WH4838> the spears, <WH7420> and put on <WH3847> the brigandines. <WH5630>

Wherefore <WH4069> have I seen <WH7200> them <WH1992> dismayed <WH2844> and turned away <WH5472> back? <WH268> and their mighty ones <WH1368> are beaten down, <WH3807> and are fled apace, <WH4498> <WH5127> and look not back: <WH6437> <WH3808> for fear <WH4032> was round about, <WH4480> <WH5439> saith <WH5002> the LORD. <WH3068>

Let not <WH408> the swift <WH7031> flee away, <WH5127> nor <WH408> the mighty man <WH1368> escape; <WH4422> they shall stumble, <WH3782> and fall <WH5307> toward the north <WH6828> by <WH5921> <WH3027> the river <WH5104> Euphrates. <WH6578>
Who <WH4310> is this <WH2088> that cometh up <WH5927> as a flood, <WH2975> whose waters <WH4325> are moved <WH1607> as the rivers? <WH5104>

Egypt <WH4714> riseth up <WH5927> like a flood, <WH2975> and his waters <WH4325> are moved <WH1607> like the rivers; <WH5104> and he saith, <WH559> I will go up, <WH5927> and will cover <WH3680> the earth; <WH776> I will destroy <WH6> the city <WH5892> and the inhabitants <WH3427> thereof.

Come up, <WH5927> ye horses; <WH5483> and rage, <WH1984> ye chariots; <WH7393> and let the mighty men <WH1368> come forth; <WH3318> the Ethiopians <WH3568> and the Libyans, <WH6316> that handle <WH8610> the shield; <WH4043> and the Lydians, <WH3866> that handle <WH8610> and bend <WH1869> the bow. <WH7198>

For this <WH1931> is the day <WH3117> of the Lord <WH136> GOD <WH3069> of hosts, <WH6635> a day <WH3117> of vengeance, <WH5360> that he may avenge <WH5358> him of his adversaries: <WH4480> <WH6862> and the sword <WH2719> shall devour, <WH398> and it shall be satiate <WH7646> and made drunk <WH7301> with their blood: <WH4480> <WH1818> for <WH3588> the Lord <WH136> GOD <WH3069> of hosts <WH6635> hath a sacrifice <WH2077> in the north <WH6828> country <WH776> by <WH413> the river <WH5104> Euphrates. <WH6578>

Go up <WH5927> into Gilead, <WH1568> and take <WH3947> balm, <WH6875> O virgin, <WH1330> the daughter <WH1323> of Egypt: <WH4714> in vain <WH7723> shalt thou use many <WH7235> medicines; <WH7499> for thou shalt not <WH369> be cured. <WH8585>

The nations <WH1471> have heard <WH8085> of thy shame, <WH7036> and thy cry <WH6682> hath filled <WH4390> the land: <WH776> for <WH3588> the mighty man <WH1368> hath stumbled <WH3782> against the mighty, <WH1368> and they are fallen <WH5307> both <WH8147> together. <WH3162>

The word <WH1697> that <WH834> the LORD <WH3068> spoke <WH1696> to <WH413> Jeremiah <WH3414> the prophet, <WH5030> how Nebuchadnezzar <WH5019> king <WH4428> of Babylon <WH894> should come <WH935> and smite <WH5221> <WH853> the land <WH776> of Egypt. <WH4714>

Declare <WH5046> ye in Egypt, <WH4714> and publish <WH8085> in Migdol, <WH4024> and publish <WH8085> in Noph <WH5297> and in Tahpanhes: <WH8471> say <WH559> ye, Stand fast, <WH3320> and prepare <WH3559> thee; for <WH3588> the sword <WH2719> shall devour <WH398> round about <WH5439> thee.
Why <WH4069> are thy valiant <WH47> men swept away? <WH5502> they stood <WH5975> not, <WH3808> because <WH3588> the LORD <WH3068> did drive <WH1920> them.

He made many <WH7235> to fall, <WH3782> yea, <WH1571> one <WH376> fell <WH5307> upon <WH413> another: <WH7453> and they said, <WH559> Arise, <WH6965> and let us go again <WH7725> to <WH413> our own people, <WH5971> and to <WH413> the land <WH776> of our nativity, <WH4138> from <WH4480> <WH6440> the oppressing <WH3238> sword. <WH2719>
They did cry <WH7121> there, <WH8033> Pharaoh <WH6547> king <WH4428> of Egypt <WH4714> is but a noise; <WH7588> he hath passed <WH5674> the time appointed. <WH4150>

As I <WH589> live, <WH2416> saith <WH5002> the King, <WH4428> whose name <WH8034> is the LORD <WH3068> of hosts, <WH6635> Surely <WH3588> as Tabor <WH8396> is among the mountains, <WH2022> and as Carmel <WH3760> by the sea, <WH3220> so shall he come. <WH935>

O thou daughter <WH1323> dwelling <WH3427> in Egypt, <WH4714> furnish <WH3627> <WH6213> thyself to go into captivity: <WH1473> for <WH3588> Noph <WH5297> shall be <WH1961> waste <WH8047> and desolate <WH3341> without <WH4480> <WH369> an inhabitant. <WH3427>
Egypt <WH4714> is like a very fair <WH3304> heifer, <WH5697> but destruction <WH7171> cometh; <WH935> it cometh <WH935> out of the north. <WH4480> <WH6828>

Also <WH1571> her hired men <WH7916> are in the midst <WH7130> of her like fatted <WH4770> bullocks; <WH5695> for <WH3588> they <WH1992> also <WH1571> are turned back, <WH6437> and are fled away <WH5127> together: <WH3162> they did not <WH3808> stand, <WH5975> because <WH3588> the day <WH3117> of their calamity <WH343> was come <WH935> upon <WH5921> them, and the time <WH6256> of their visitation. <WH6486>

The voice <WH6963> thereof shall go <WH1980> like a serpent; <WH5175> for <WH3588> they shall march <WH1980> with an army, <WH2428> and come <WH935> against her with axes, <WH7134> as hewers <WH2404> of wood. <WH6086>

They shall cut down <WH3772> her forest, <WH3293> saith <WH5002> the LORD, <WH3068> though <WH3588> it cannot <WH3808> be searched; <WH2713> because <WH3588> they are more <WH7231> than the grasshoppers, <WH4480> <WH697> and are innumerable. <WH369> <WH4557>
The daughter <WH1323> of Egypt <WH4714> shall be confounded; <WH3001> she shall be delivered <WH5414> into the hand <WH3027> of the people <WH5971> of the north. <WH6828>

The LORD <WH3068> of hosts, <WH6635> the God <WH430> of Israel, <WH3478> saith; <WH559> Behold, <WH2009> I will punish <WH6485> <WH413> the multitude <WH528> of No, <WH4480> <WH4996> and Pharaoh, <WH6547> and Egypt, <WH4714> with <WH5921> their gods, <WH430> and their kings; <WH4428> even Pharaoh, <WH6547> and all them that trust <WH982> in him:

And I will deliver <WH5414> them into the hand <WH3027> of those that seek <WH1245> their lives, <WH5315> and into the hand <WH3027> of Nebuchadnezzar <WH5019> king <WH4428> of Babylon, <WH894> and into the hand <WH3027> of his servants: <WH5650> and afterward <WH310> <WH3651> it shall be inhabited, <WH7931> as in the days <WH3117> of old, <WH6924> saith <WH5002> the LORD. <WH3068>

But fear <WH3372> not <WH408> thou, <WH859> O my servant <WH5650> Jacob, <WH3290> and be not <WH408> dismayed, <WH2865> O Israel: <WH3478> for, <WH3588> behold, <WH2009> I will save <WH3467> thee from afar off, <WH4480> <WH7350> and thy seed <WH2233> from the land <WH4480> <WH776> of their captivity; <WH7628> and Jacob <WH3290> shall return, <WH7725> and be in rest <WH8252> and at ease, <WH7599> and none <WH369> shall make him afraid. <WH2729>

Fear <WH3372> thou <WH859> not, <WH408> O Jacob <WH3290> my servant, <WH5650> saith <WH5002> the LORD: <WH3068> for <WH3588> I <WH589> am with <WH854> thee; for <WH3588> I will make <WH6213> a full end <WH3617> of all <WH3605> the nations <WH1471> whither <WH834> <WH8033> I have driven <WH5080> thee: but I will not <WH3808> make <WH6213> a full end <WH3617> of thee, but correct <WH3256> thee in measure; <WH4941> yet will I not <WH3808> leave thee wholly <WH5352> unpunished. <WH5352>
